sources.title: The Thief Of Baghdad (1924) [Colorized, 4K, 60FPS]
sources.description: The Thief Of Baghdad is a 1924 black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2022 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @  https://colab.research.google.com    Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing:  https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify  A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS:  https://rife-vfi.github.io    A.I. Upscaling to 4K:  https://ffmpeg.org    GPU: Google Colab.  This movie is in public domain category and it is Copyright free.
